title: web Request Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Performs an HTTP or HTTPS request against an external endpoint, with the ability to specify any valid HTTP method.

content.description: The MIME type of the body or payload of the response. Default is `application/json`.

method.description: The HTTP method of the request. Must be one of GET, PUT, POST, DELETE, PATCH, HEAD, OPTIONS, TRACE, or CONNECT.

name.description: A web URL endpoint relative to the host configured in the Proxy Route. URL parameters may be added to this argument as well (e.g. `/getLatest?id=1`).

route.description: Alias for a Proxy Route in Notehub.

annotations.title: note
annotations.description: Please see the additional argument options available for [`GET`](/api-reference/notecard-api/web-requests/latest/#web-get), [`POST`](/api-reference/notecard-api/web-requests/latest/#web-post), [`PUT`](/api-reference/notecard-api/web-requests/latest/#web-put), and [`DELETE`](/api-reference/notecard-api/web-requests/latest/#web-delete) requests in the documentation provided.

annotations.title: warning
annotations.description: The Notecard must have an active connection to Notehub while performing any web.* request. Please [consult this guide](/notecard/notecard-walkthrough/web-transactions/) for more information.

samples.title: Web Transaction
samples.description: Performs a simple HTTP or HTTPS request and returns the response.
